name: weather-info
description: Get real-time weather information and weather forecasts for any location in China. Includes temperature, humidity, wind, air quality, and detailed forecasts.

tools.name: get_realtime_weather
tools.description: Get real-time weather information for a specified location including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and air quality.

location.description: Location name (e.g., '北京', '上海', '广州'). Can be city name or district name.

tools.name: get_weather_forecast
tools.description: Get weather forecast for multiple days including temperature range, weather conditions, and wind information.
